WUGEN
CSL ARCH Module » C66x

Files

file  dsp_wugen.h
 This file contains the API prototypes for configuring DSP_WUGEN for DSP.

void DSP_WUGEN_DMAEVENT_Disable ( uint16_t  dmaEvtNum)

This API disables the DSP wakeup event for requested DMA event.

Parameters
dmaEvtNum- DMA event number
Returns
None.
